about_the_game:
Squash is a racket sport played by two players on a four-walled court with a small rubber ball. Players take turns hitting the ball with their rackets on the playable surfaces of the court walls.

With Squash Sport Game 2024 you can enjoy the most exciting and fastest racket sport playing in four different scenarios and against six players until you get the best score and leave your name to remember. You will be able to see the replay of the most spectacular plays during the tournament and surprise your opponents by fighting for the ball until the final.

You can enjoy it:

  • Playing against the machine or against another player.
  • Watching the replays of the best plays.
  • Play with joystick or keyboard.
  • Select your player from all existing players.
  • Four courts to play on.

name: Squash Sport Game 2024

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Windows 7 / Windows 10 (32/64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 / Core™ i5-2500K o AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 o AMD Radeon™ RX 470 - Sistema compatible con DirectX 12.0
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: With Squash Sport Game 2024 you can enjoy the most exciting and fastest racket sport playing in four different scenarios and against six players until you get the best score and leave your name to remember.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
